title: Emerald Grace Jhumka - Exquisite Bridal Earrings
materials: Emerald Green Faceted Stone. Finished with Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Classic Jhumka design featuring a tiered floral pattern adorned with sparkling CZ stones. A single emerald green stone is elegantly set at the top, adding a touch of royalty. The Jhumka bells are intricately crafted with a cage-like design, culminating in delicate pearl-like droplets. The intricate detailing and stone setting exemplify the finesse of South Indian craftsmanship.
colors: with a vibrant Emerald Green accent.
occasions: and special events. These earrings can also elevate your style for a contemporary party look
description: These Jhumka earrings seamlessly blend traditional South Indian design with modern elegance. The high-quality CZ stones offer a brilliant sparkle, while the emerald green accent adds a pop of color and sophistication. Crafted with meticulous detail and finished with durable Hyderabadi Polish, these earrings are a timeless addition to any jewelry collection. They are lightweight and comfortable to wear, making them perfect for long events.
